faction_profile.name: 소림사 (Shaolin Temple / 少林寺)
alias: The North Star of Wulin (무림의 태산북두)
Origin of All Martial Arts (천하공부출소림 / 天下功夫出少林)

location.mountain: Mt. Song (Songshan / 숭산) - Specifically the Shaoshi Peak (소실봉).
location.geography: Surrounded by forests (hence 'Shaolin'). To the north is the Yellow River (Hwang-ho).
landmarks: Mountain Gate (Sanmun / 山門) - The imposing main entrance with the black-gold signboard written by Emperor Kangxi.
Dharma Hall (Daeungbojeon / 大雄寶殿) - Main gathering hall.
Tower Forest (Taprim / 塔林) - Graveyard of pagodas for past masters.
Scripture Library (Janggyeonggak / 藏經閣) - Stores 72 Arts and Sutras.
Bodhidharma Cave (Chamhoe-dong / 懺悔洞) - Prison for sinners/Wall-gazing training.

heritage.founder: Bhadra (Balta / 발타선사) historically; Bodhidharma (Dalma / 달마대사) in Wuxia lore.
heritage.history: Famous for the 13 Stick Monks saving Emperor Li Shimin (Tang Dynasty).

status.political_role: Leader or Spiritual Anchor of the Murim Alliance. Usually stays neutral until a crisis threatens the world.

elites: 18 Arhats (Sippal-nahan / 十八羅漢) - Formation specialists.
4 Guardian Kings (Sadae-geumgang / 四大金剛) - Top tier guardians.

combat_style.summary: Hard External Arts transforming into Supreme Internal Arts.
combat_style.visuals: Golden Body (Geumgang), crushing palm strikes, immovable defense.
combat_style.core_mechanic: 72 Supreme Arts (72 Jeol-ye). A vast library of techniques for every body part.

signature_ultimate.name: 역근경 & 세수경 (Yi Jin Jing & Xi Sui Jing)
signature_ultimate.description: The ultimate internal arts of Bodhidharma. Reinforces tendons/meridians (Yi Jin) and cleanses bone marrow (Xi Sui).
signature_ultimate.effect: Provides infinite internal energy and perfect physical condition.

body_hardening.name: 금강불괴 (Diamond Indestructible Body / 金剛不壞)
body_hardening.description: The pinnacle of hard qigong. The body becomes invulnerable to blades and poison.

list.name: 여래신장 (Tathagata Palm)
list.note: Often depicted as a lost or supreme Buddhist palm art.

list: 일지선공 (One Finger Zen / 一指禪功) - Shooting Qi from a finger.

movement.description: Crossing a river on a single reed. The symbol of extreme lightness skill.

formations.name: 십팔나한진 (18 Arhat Formation)
formations.description: Unbreakable formation used to trap supreme masters.

narrative_role: The 'Final Wall' that protects the justice of the Wulin.
The place where the protagonist finds a 'Secret Manual' (e.g., Yi Jin Jing) in the library.
The arbiter of disputes (The Abbot's word is law).
A place of penance for powerful villains (imprisoned in the caves).
